zh-CN.title: 心理健康数据隐私补充
bullets: 本测评属于敏感心理健康信息，平台执行哈希化与脱敏策略，不在可回读层保存逐题明文答案。
平台保存核心结果数据（维度分数、风险等级、质量标记、版本快照）用于报告生成与历史对比。
用户可申请删除测评记录；删除后报告与相关导出文件不可访问。
数据传输与存储采用加密与访问控制，日志与埋点不记录逐题答案明文。

en.title: Mental Health Data Privacy Addendum
bullets: This assessment contains sensitive mental health data and uses hashing plus de-identification; readable raw item answers are not retained.
Core result fields (scores, risk levels, quality flags, version snapshots) are retained for report generation and history comparison.
Users may request deletion; reports and related exports become inaccessible after deletion.
Transport and storage are protected with encryption and access control; logs and analytics do not store raw item answers.
